title: S4 LF Duo Partner (Bot Lane Preferred)
body:
Looking for a duo partner who is willing to climb with me. 

I'm adept at playing all roles with top being the least preferable and the bottom roles being the most. 

If we mesh well together I am also available to use comms (Skype/Discord) in future games.

Add me if you are interested so we can chat. 


Thanks,
Connoisseur

replies.body:
A skillshot player Can play all role pretty well but been focused on adc and jg this and last season have all champ and can play most champs
But pref in order  {{champion:81}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:133}}
